# handle(_:)

**Instance Method**

Processes a given incoming message on the port.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func handle(_ message: NSPortMessage)
```

```swift
optional func handle(_ message: PortMessage)
```

## Parameters

- **message**: An incoming port message.

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Port] for more information.

The delegate should implement either [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PortDelegate/handle(_:)] or the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMachPortDelegate] protocol method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMachPortDelegate/handleMachMessage(_:)]. You must not implement both delegate methods.

## Related Documentation

- **Distributed Objects Programming Topics**
